attributes.action: Change the flag back to normal on the england shirt.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is are flag,  it's are history they have know right to change it
attributes.background: Tell nike they have no right to deface the England flag

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
